channel.title: Windows XP Workstation
channel.description:
I’m attempting to test whonix with a windows xp workstation. I setup the whonix gateway without any issue and input what I believe is the proper data in the network settings on the windows box. The only problem is when I try to test the connection via the browser it doesn’t seem to be able to be able to connect. I am using virtual box for the gateway and vmware for the windows workstation.
Any help would be much appreciated. :)
Here are some screen shots from my setup attempt: [img]http://image.bayimg.com/317bcbc94a7e5e007a075600b266414314354dcb.jpg[/img] [img]http://image.bayimg.com/35930449f70305cb7a091dd3cf947ea5b8000a5d.jpg[/img]

item.title: Windows XP Workstation
item.dc:creator: securitykid
item.description:
got everything working

thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I guess you saw https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems already?

In particular https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Windows-Whonix-Workstation?

Have you changed VirtualBox VM settings already?

In particular:
Network -> Adapter 1 -> Name (of Internal Network) (Important!): Whonix

Which browser?

Read full topic
